less interested in any reconnection with Jay Leno . His relationship with David Letterman remains unaffected- his Late Night predecessor apparently called him over the holidays. "It was just a quick call," Conan O'Brien qualifies. We hadn't spoken for a long time, and David Letterman just called to basically say, you know,' I haven't checked in on you. I just wanted to make sure that we were good.' And I said, "We've always been good.' I have a lot of respect for that guy. It was not a lengthy phone call. He's not a blabbermouth, but it was nice.
